meanings.definition: A small, hard, fruit-flavored candy with a chewy center.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of starbursts, especially the chewy center.
meanings.sent2: She shared a pack of starbursts with her friends during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The starbursts in the jar seemed to be calling my name.
meanings.sent4: The colorful starbursts in the candy store looked like a rainbow explosion.
meanings.sent5: The starbursts melted in my mouth, releasing bursts of fruity flavor.

meanings.definition: A sudden, bright flash of light in the sky.
meanings.sent1: The night sky was filled with starbursts of light from the fireworks.
meanings.sent2: A shooting star created a beautiful starburst across the dark sky.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected starburst of light startled the stargazers.
meanings.sent4: The starburst of fireworks lit up the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The starburst of the meteor shower was a breathtaking sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A pattern of lines or rays radiating from a central point.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted a starburst of lines emanating from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The explosion left a starburst pattern on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The starburst design on the cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The starburst of light created a stunning effect in the photograph.
meanings.sent5: The starburst of colors on the canvas added depth to the artwork.
